notes.text: We now ensure that the analytical table supports the contextdefiningproperties annotation
We've resolved an issue that caused incorrect enablement of the action buttons
We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
You can now add additional custom fields to the top of the mass edit dialog
You can now use the context menu to create a new object in the tree table
You can now use the createDocument API to create a document using the Table building block
We now support key user adaptation on the mass edit dialog
We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
We now ensure that applications open correctly in SAP Build Work Zone
We now properly translate the editing status column on the table personalization
We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the “Share” menu
We no longer consider the text annotation on a groupable property if the target property of the text is non-groupable for analytical tables
We've resolved an issue where the Delete action on a table didn't function correctly after navigating away and returning to the object page
You can now define a custom “save” logic for the Mass Edit dialog using the extensionAPI
We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
We now support "Pattern" as a format option for date-and-time-based controls
We now ensure that the correct metamodel is passed to the removeSensitive data function
We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
